item.title: Dev-Env
item.description: Dev-Env IP address official: 218.50.144.124 Ubuntu: 192.168.35.38 Windows: 192.168.35.39 docker ip4: 172.17.0.1 docker sm: 255.255.0.0 ip(basic): 192.168.35.39 sm: 255.255.255.0 gw: 192.168.35.1 dns1: 210.220.163.82 dns2: 219.250.36.130 Devices I7+RTX3060+SSD256 I5+RTX+SSD500 (260000+X+150000) WINDOWS UBUNTU CLIENT SERVER PYTHON C/C++ jupyter ‘argon2:$argon2id$v=19$m=10240,t=10,p=8$bEKn8Xh2rhEU4YxjKzgMEg$jlfr1J3rVim+L4sSFyPuLA’

item.title: ANACONDA3
item.description: ANACONDA3 checking virtual envs conda info --envs (base) auto run off conda config --set auto_activate_base False Add vertual env conda create -n $NAME$ python=3.8

item.title: GIT
UBUNTU
item.description: UBUNTU apt-get (sudo) apt-get update (sudo) apt-get upgrade (sudo) apt-get install [package name] ex) sudo apt-get install htop background 실행 확인 ps -ef |grep python

item.title: HUGO
item.description: HUGO hugo build checking hugo server --baseURL "http://{ip addr}:1313" --bind "0.0.0.0" hugo server --baseURL "http://192.168.xxx.xxx:1313" --bind "0.0.0.0" add .md file hugo new *.md build hugo -t [theme DIR] hugo -t hyde git push cd public git add . git commit -m "<커밋 메세지>" git push origin master cd .. git add . git commit -m "<커밋 메세지>" git push origin master

item.title: DEEPLEARNING
item.description: DEEPLEARNING 참고 도구 -> 기타 -> 코기 모드 + 아기고양이 모드 설정 필수입니다. 너무 귀엽쥬 도구 -> 기타 -> 파워 레벨 설정하면 코딩 할때, 재밋습니다. 단점으로 정신사납습니다. GPU 할당 x_gpu2 = x_cpu.to(‘cuda:1’)

item.title: DOCKER
item.description: DOCKER login docker login docker run docker run -it -p 8888:8888 continuumio/anaconda3 nvidia-docker run --restart="always" -itd --network mybridge --ip 172.18.0.3 -p:8888:80 -v ~/Documents/DEV/super-resolution/:/var/super-resolution --name test tensorflow/tensorflow:2.6.0-gpu-jupyter container check docker ps docker ps -a delete container docker rm [container ID] image check docker images delete image docker rmi [image ID] docker exit with quit ctrl + D docker exit without quit ctrl + P, ctrl + Q generate bridge docker network create --driver bridge [bridge name] $docker inspect mybridge docker network docker network ls docker network rm [network name] ex) docker container init (#jupyter notebook) docker pull tensorflow/tensorflow:2.
